description: A representation of details of a Pricing.
title: pricing

___oneTimeCharges.description: An array of One Time Charge on Pricing.

$eref.description: An one-time charge is levied once. An example is an activation fee.
$eref.title: oneTimeCharge

___name.description: The name the One-Time Charge is known by (e.g., Activation Fee).

___price.description: The amount of money that characterizes the price.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, oneTimeCharge.
The type of the object, pricing.

$eref.description: A quantity that specifies an amount and units.
$eref.title: quantity

___units.description: The unit of measure for the quantity.

___amount.description: A quantity of something. Typically size, value, extent, or money.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, bandwidthProfile.

___pricingTerm.description: The length of the service contract in months.

___recurringCharges.description: An array of Recurring Charge on Pricing.
